content: अजकावः --वं {@--1@} Śiva's bow. {@--2@} [ अजकं छागं वाति प्रीणाति; वा-क] <ab>N.</ab> of the tree वर्वरी, of which goats are said to be very fond. {@--3@} [अजका अजागलस्तनइव वाति प्रकाशते वा-क] A sacrificial vessel of wood (of the form of अजागल) dedicated to Mitra and Varuṇa (--वं in this sense) मैत्रावरुणपात्रं. {@--4@} A disease of the pupil of the eye = अजकाजात <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--5@} A venomous kind of vermin (अजका रोगविशेषः, तद्विषं).

अजकावः --वं {@--1@} Śiva's bow. {@--2@} [ अजकं छागं वाति प्रीणाति; वा-क] <ab>N.</ab> of the tree वर्वरी, of which goats are said to be very fond. {@--3@} [अजका अजागलस्तनइव वाति प्रकाशते वा-क] A sacrificial vessel of wood (of the form of अजागल) dedicated to Mitra and Varuṇa (--वं in this sense) मैत्रावरुणपात्रं. {@--4@} A disease of the pupil of the eye = अजकाजात <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--5@} A venomous kind of vermin (अजका रोगविशेषः, तद्विषं).
